title: Chicken tagine with lemons
ingredients: ['1 chicken (about 1kg), cut into pieces', '100ml olive oil', '1/2 small bunch fresh coriander, minced', '1/2 small bunch parsley, minced', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 pinch saffron threads', 'pepper', '2 onions', '4 garlic cloves', '1/2 chicken stock cube', '1 lemon', '1 (350g) jar pitted green olives, drained', '1 preserved lemon', 'steamed couscous or bread']
